org.cougaar.core.node
Interface NodeControlService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
public interface NodeControlService
extends Service

This service s provided by the Node to node-agent components for access to the node-wide root ServiceBroker and AgentContainer.

Access is restricted to node-agent components.

Method Summary
 AgentContainer getRootContainer()
          Returns the AgentContainer.
 ServiceBroker getRootServiceBroker()
          Returns the root service broker.
 void shutdown()
          Shuts down the node.
 

Method Detail

getRootServiceBroker

ServiceBroker getRootServiceBroker()
Returns the root service broker.

getRootContainer

AgentContainer getRootContainer()
Returns the AgentContainer.

shutdown

void shutdown()
Shuts down the node. This method shuts down all agents, including the node agent.
